column4: F**ing machine,, my laptop wireless is a mess,, goddamn atheros based chip, it flipflops from connected to disconnected every minute or so. someone on a forum said it was to do with "iwpriv ath0 bgscan 0" and that would prevent background channel scans from forking your connection, but i've done that and still get the same issue.. and it just locked up my machine a second ago.l.... soooooooooooooo angry with this now..
I had the same issue yesterday and this fixed it
but if it is already all set
depends on how many interfaces you have
for example I have eth0 as wired
and eth1 for the wireless interface
